title: Digital Campaign Analyst
description:
NextWave Digital is Seeking a Digital Campaign Analyst (Full-Time)

At NextWave Digital, a vibrant marketing agency based in San Francisco, we specialize in crafting data-driven campaigns for clients in tech, healthcare, and education. We’re looking for a dedicated Digital Campaign Analyst to join our team and help optimize our clients’ digital strategies.

Role Overview
In this role, you’ll dive deep into campaign data, uncovering insights to enhance performance across digital channels. You’ll work closely with media planners, content creators, and clients to ensure campaigns achieve maximum impact.

Key Responsibilities
- Analyze campaign performance using tools like Google Analytics and Adobe Analytics.
- Create dashboards to track KPIs such as ROI, CTR, and conversions.
- Collaborate with media teams to refine campaign strategies.
- Conduct A/B testing to optimize ad creatives and targeting.
- Prepare client reports with actionable insights.
- Monitor industry trends to keep campaigns innovative.
- Support budget planning for digital campaigns.
- Engage with client stakeholders to align on goals.
- Contribute to campaign brainstorming sessions.
- Ensure data accuracy in all analytics tasks.

What We’re Looking For
We need candidates with 2–3 years of experience in digital analytics, proficient in Google Analytics, Adobe Analytics, and similar tools. Strong data analysis and reporting skills are essential, along with experience in A/B testing. Excellent communication and teamwork abilities are required. A Bachelor’s degree in marketing, data science, or a related field is necessary.

Why NextWave?
We’re a team that thrives on creativity and collaboration. Our hybrid work model offers flexibility, blending remote work with in-office innovation. We invest in your growth through training programs, certifications, and access to premium analytics tools. You’ll work on diverse projects that challenge you to think strategically and deliver results.

Benefits Package
Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
401(k) with matching contributions
20 days of paid time off annually
Annual professional development budget
Access to analytics platforms
Team-building retreats and wellness initiatives

Join Our Team
If you’re passionate about data and digital marketing, apply today to make an impact with NextWave Digital!
